reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Man Bag
reviews.reviewText: I finally found a replacement for my old faithful bag I've used for years. It's a man bag for me and this is the perfect size. I don't need a full messenger bag yet I didn't want one of those petite wallet and phone holders, Very well made, and a 1st I thought it a bit stiff but after a few weeks, it's really coming into its own. This bag has 5 exterior compartments with zippers and one hidden zippered interior pocket. In addition to using it as an everyday bag . I'm a photographer and when I go out for a casual shoot I can carry an extra lens or a few little ditties, no problem! I've carried a bag for years now. My everyday item phone, wallet, earbuds, water bottle and comfort items tissues medications, etc,.and it still has room for a small item from the store. For the price, I don't know how you can go wrong, glamorous NO, practical? Oh yeah !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad I did not let the fact that it's listed as a Man's Messenger Bag keep me from checking it out. It is PERFECT - right size, not too big or small - holds all my essentials and is a comfortable carry as cross body bag!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size and multiple compartments
reviews.reviewText: Good size and multiple compartments for organizing but the material is very stiff and noisy. I'd rather it be more like cloth - softer and quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy bag
reviews.reviewText: I use this bag for work and I love it. There are tones of zippered pockets and the main compartment fits my iPad with no problem. The material is strong and easy to clean. All of the zippers work well and the strap is very adjustable, from shoulder to cross body. I love this and will probably buy in more colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size for my overseas traveling
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for my traveling overseas. It holds my documents, try-fold umbrella, water bottle, phone, wallet, snacks, etc. I carry it on my shoulder and across my chest. I can easily move it to my front in a pickpocket infested area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like other people have written, it was time to replace my old reliable manbag. I'm very particular about what I need for a crossbody bag, and I ordered a few and returned them for one reason or another. This inexpensive bag hits all the right notes. First of all, it's a great size, larger than the one I replaced.It fits personal items, notebook and pens, a small camera that's with me all the time, sunglasses case, etc. etc. Lots of stuff. I have a funny habit of naming the pockets on my bags and backpacks so I remember what goes where once I've organized things. I have a food pocket, an office pocket, a library, a drugstore pocket, a vault, etc. Hilarious, right? Anyway, this bag has lots of pockets of various sizes so I can stay very organized. And it's super-cheap, much, much less than others I tried. It feels well-made enough, but I don't have 100% confidence that it will last as long as my last one, so I ordered a second one to keep in reserve. The zippers and the bag were a bit stiff at first but it's wearing in nicely. Took it on an extended trip and it was with me constantly. Minor nit: I'd prefer to have some pen loops inside, but really, that's a very minor point. Highly recommended. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small messenger bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not canvas, more like polyester but tons of large pockets
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to iron on a patch to make it easy to identify my bag. That's why I was looking for canvas which is made from cotton. I'm not sure what this is made since there's no label but it's not cotton. I was able to iron on the patch being careful not to use too high a heat. Didn't have any problems with the bag material melting. Just wanted to give others an accurate idea about the material used to make this.
